songs.title: No features
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Hey, let's toast life
Every day to the year in good health
Stayed around for the counter to gear, enjoyed wealth
Always slumming, everybody's this year's about self
Let's do this on our own, No features

[Verse 1: Sadat X]
This is my new year's resolution
Finally have the solution, this year's an execution
Trying clear all pollution, we doing our own distribution
Trying clear all confusion, When I look back on this 365
I'm glad to be alive
But this year i've got to show more drive
The world don't stop in order to pop
You gotta grab for the gold
Squeeze it, never release it
The moment, seize it
And youse the man playing rise
Yo 15 minutes the size, how you gon' last
I swear this the blast, it gave me that thing that i asked
Travel, money, i've tasted the honey and what's funny? It don't mean shit

[Chorus]

[Verse 2: Sadat X]
Always out there grabbing
If you got to stab it, make it happen
Life int he face nigga grab it
Pressure to succeed
